name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Raymond G. LAVALLEE.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Raymond G. LAVALLEE.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Raymond G. LAVALLEE.
No. D-2876.
Supreme Court of the United States
Feb. 29, 2016.
Raymond G. Lavallee, of Hauppauge, New York, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
